text: Ezɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨzim, a Godɨn ifongiamɨn gɨn mangan koghtɨ an a bagh bar akongeghan kogham. Guizbangɨra, gumazir Godɨn boroghɨra mangasava amim, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn ikɨ, God a iti. Egh a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn ikɨ, God deravɨra gumazamizir a buribagh ami.
